name: Introduction to Historical Musicology
description: This course introduces students to the field of Historical Musicology, covering the history of music, music theory, and performance practice.

name: Music of the Middle Ages
description: This course covers the history of music from the Middle Ages to the early modern period, with a focus on notation, performance practice, and composition.

name: Music of the Baroque and Classical Periods
description: This course covers the history of music from the Baroque to the Classical period, with a focus on notation, performance practice, and composition.

name: Music of the Romantic and Modern Periods
description: This course covers the history of music from the Romantic to the Modern period, with a focus on notation, performance practice, and composition.
prerequisites: Music of the Baroque and Classical Periods
